name: MultiRes
description:
Allows you to set 4 different screen settings under the general settings tab.
 
Changelog - v3.0.2
 [indent]- Resolved an issue where changed config values were not reflected in the Mod Options UI.[/indent]

Changelog - v3.0.1
 [indent]- Resolved an issue with the new config approach.[/indent]

Changelog - v3.0.0
 [indent]- Updated for game version 1.1.13.x[/indent]
 [indent]- Moved Screen Stretch setting to mod options[/indent]
 [indent]- Make sure to subscribe to [url=<https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2944608034>]{mod options!}[/url][/indent]

Changelog - v2.3.3
 [indent]- Added 4th option: expand (no zoom out)[/indent]
 [indent]- Ty Vergir for implementing this![/indent]

Changelog - v2.3.2
 [indent]- Fixed an issue where the Screen Stretch Setting where not visible. [/indent]
 [indent]- Ty Buschti for reporting the issue![/indent]

Changelog - v2.3.1
 [indent]- Fixed an issue where the stat popup appears behind the pause menu. [/indent]
 [indent]- Ty lx and Nodoka for reporting the issue![/indent]

Changelog - v2.3.0
 [indent]- Updated for Brotato v1.1.0.1 [/indent]

Changelog - v2.2.0
 [indent]- Updated for the new ModLoader version. [/indent]
 [indent]- Added compatibility for an upcoming character. [/indent]

 Changelog - v2.1.1 
 [indent]- Added a min height and width for the expand setting, but still switch the screen stretch to expand. 
 This should fix the very zoomed in camera on the Steam Deck. [/indent]

 Changelog - v2.1.0 
 [indent]- Removed the check for minimum width, so setting to expand should work now for everyone. [/indent]
